indroduction-description: I am a frontend developer from Mönchengladbach and love creating web applications with Angular and JavaScript. Thanks to my eye for detail and my technical skills, I am able to implement projects in a visually appealing and user-friendly way. I am looking forward to new challenges and am open to learning other frameworks such as React.js or Vue.js.
portfolio-description: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code. Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
contact-description: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact-cta: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
acknowledgment3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
